Text:
[II] The Lord has gathered together His Church through the Spirit. We implore Him with firm hope:
[IR] Renew, Lord, the face of creation.
[I1] Lord Jesus, who, being exalted on the cross, poured from your side rivers of living water,
[I2] send your Spirit who gives us life.
[I1] You, who, are glorified at the right hand of God, have given to the disciples the gift of the Father,
[I2] send your Spirit to renew the world.
[I1] You, who, gave the Apostles power from your Spirit to overcome sin,
[I2] send your Spirit to destroy sin throughout creation.
[I1] You, who, promised the Holy Spirit would teach us all things and remind us of all that you have said:
[I2] send your Spirit to illuminate our faith.
[I1] You, Who, promised to send the Spirit of truth to witness about you,
[I2] send your Spirit to make us faithful witnesses.
Changes: 2022-06-18 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions
